mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bid_tb (user_id, auction_id, bid_money, bid_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{auctionId}, #{bidMoney}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT b.user_id AS userId, b.auction_id AS auctionId, b.bid_money AS bidMoney, b.bid_time AS bidTime, u.name AS userName FROM bid_tb b JOIN userentity u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.auction_id = #{auctionId} ORDER BY b.bid_money DESC

SELECT a.auction_id, a.auction_lot, a.auction_author, a.auction_title, a.auction_size, a.auction_madeDate, a.auction_materials, a.auction_authorExp, a.auction_startPrice, a.auction_guessPrice, s.auctionSchedule_id, s.auctionSchedule_start, a.auction_end_time, at1.uuid AS attachUuid1, at1.uploadpath AS attachUploadpath1, at1.filename AS attachFilename1, at2.uuid AS attachUuid2, at2.uploadpath AS attachUploadpath2, at2.filename AS attachFilename2 FROM auction_tb a LEFT JOIN auctionschedule_tb s ON a.auctionSchedule_id = s.auctionSchedule_id LEFT JOIN auction_attach1 at1 ON a.auction_id = at1.auction_id LEFT JOIN auction_attach2 at2 ON a.auction_id = at2.auction_id WHERE a.auction_id = #{auctionId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_bid_tb (user_id, auction_id, max_bid_limit, bid_status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{auctionId}, #{maxBidLimit}, 'ACTIVE')
mapper.select: SELECT auto_bid_id AS autoBidId, user_id AS userId, auction_id AS auctionId, max_bid_limit AS maxBidLimit, bid_status AS bidStatus FROM auto_bid_tb WHERE auction_id = #{auctionId} AND bid_status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY auto_bid_id ASC
